column4: Question: How would I download this file through terminal? 'http://us.download.nvidia.com/XFree86/Linux-x86/169.07/NVIDIA-Linux-x86-169.07-pkg1.run'
I attempted that, and it kept saying "Name or service unknown' and it seems like I spelt everything right.
I'm just going to install ssh-server and SCP the file over. Should hopefully work through recovery console.
